paper_abstract: In this article, we study k-noncrossing RNA structures with minimum arc-length 4 and at most k - 1 mutually crossing bonds. Let T-k([4])(n) denote the number of k-noncrossing RNA structures with arc-lenght >= 4 over n vertices. We (a) prove a functional equation for the generating function Sigma n >= 0 T-k([4]) (n)z(n) and (b) derive for 4 <= k <= 9 the asymptotic formula T-k([4])(n) similar to ckn(-((k-1)2+(k-1)/2)) gamma(-n)(k). Furthermore, we explicitly compute the exponential growth rates gamma(-1)(k) and asymptotic formulas for 4 <= k <= 9.
